stimulusHtml: According to the sentence, what does a wise person wish to do?

features.html:
Sapiens ex nostris animis vitia, quae nos vexant,

pellere vult.

Â

choicesHtml: Trouble evil people so that they leave others alone
Avoid people with vices that upset them
Bother us until we realize we have vices
Work to make us better, happier people
